channel.title: Posts on PLA Cycling Log
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on PLA Cycling Log

item.title: Trial a longer, potentially safer route to work
item.description: I cycle to work two days a week from Summerville to Moncks Corner SC via Hwy 17-A which is a busy 4 lane highway. The video was taken during my trial to stay off highways as much as possible. I came out the back of Nexton, through Cane Bay, through Del Webb, onto Black Tom Rd, and finally back onto Hwy 17-A. This route is about 20 miles vs my normal route of 16 miles.
